review: bad game

我刚开始接触这款游戏是在2018年末，因为他的知名度和玩法我深深地爱上了他。
遥想当时用几个星期攒下来的零花钱满怀期待的购买，认识了一起玩ow1的朋友，听着call me maybe 和霉霉的哥，别有一番滋味，但因为暴雪的作死，我失去了他，如今他落魄地回来，却不是当年一样的了。
虽然时间会过去，但连回忆的资本都没有了，战绩 好友 欢乐 皮肤灰飞烟灭，留下的只有解锁这些的一道锁，我要打开这些锁，可战绩和皮肤大部分可以回来，那好友和欢乐呢？遥不可及
这个好评纯粹是想送给当时的我 当时的一切，至于暴雪你还是去死吧

你去你的暴雪吧 玩了7年的ow说没了就没了是吧 老子念你2016年的那年夏天给了爷美妙的游戏回忆一直不离不弃 奈何你byd之后是真不干人事 劳资绝不再给你充一分钱 赚你那丧良心的钱真就一点脸都不要了是吧 国服数据你一句话说不恢复就不恢复了是吧 你烤迪克真是把眉目清秀前面三个字占完了 中国玩家念你们以前暴雪游戏必出精品 天天有暴白给你洗 结果你byd搅屎棍最后一点台阶都不要了是吧 还好意思上steam炒热度 最开始还不支持简中 又立牌坊又当beach。 shiit外面包了层金子你真以为自己是金子了是吧 ow1好好的你丫偏要教玩家玩游戏 改了个5v5就敢说自己是ow2了是吧 真就把老玩家不当人 把新玩家当傻子 每个暴黑曾经都是暴白 玩家们念以前的旧情玩你这破b游戏给你点b脸真以为自己人五人六了 劳资也是贱 玩个游戏没招谁惹谁还被电子仙人跳 f***ku kotick.

Гра непогана але є один нюанс - її створили Blizzard. Очікувано що тим хто витратили гроші на першу частину практично нічого не дали, а нововведений PVE режим зробили платним. Але як для людини яка вперше грає в Overwatch, і не особо любить купляти баттл пасс та всякі скіни (через що мені не доводиться бачити ціни на них), а просто зайти пограти стандартні режими і лівнути гра досить непогана. Хоча це і не відміняє жадібність компанії

杀杀杀杀杀杀杀！背信之人曰可杀！

不义之人曰可杀！不仁之人曰可杀！

无尊之人曰可杀！不礼不智不信人。

大西王曰杀杀杀！我生而为玩家来。

总是刀下觳觫材，传令玩家善言者。

ahhh overwatch. ever since they put a 2 on the end this game hasnt been fun. $20-$40 skins. the even put a price tag on OLDER skins that you used to be able to unlock free or through loot boxes. ahhhhh loot boxes. everyone misses the loot boxes!  battlepass rewards are trash. you dont get currency through the battlepass like you would EVERY OTHER GAME. and the currency they do give you through weekly missions wont even buy you that one really cool skin you want OR THE NEXT BATTLE PASS. Diablo Immortal all over again. this game may be fun at times but progression seems dull and non existent. i LOVE OVERWATCH and it saddens me to see what has happened to this game. BUT IF YOU HAVE NEVER PLAYED OVERWATCH AND NEVER PAID FOR IT you shouldtry it out. just beware of the prices of these skins. good luck everyone!
多好的游戏，可惜是暴雪的

This game is a sorry excuse for a sequel. In reality its another predatory "free to play model" shooter game that shits on any of the quality of life that the first game had since you did actually have to pay for that one. After around 3 or 4 years in development and leaving the first game dead in the water, blizzard has failed to deliver on basically every promise they made, and any of the campaign content they are releasing now have been severely gutted from the original gameplay footage shown off. No more skill trees, no more hundreds of missions, no more Jeff. 

I supported and played this game nearly every day for around 7 to 8 months after its release and now I realize how much of a moron I was for doing so. There were times when I was genuinely excited for the next updates, and maybe getting to play that PvE content that was promised one day, but now its very clear that we were all played for fools for a quick buck. Do not support this terrible excuse of a competitive shooter, since its clear there was never any intentions of delivering on what was promised to the community. go play tf2 or even fuckin paladins man, just don't play this.

At this moment, I'm sorta disappointed.

I waited for the game to download for my computer just to get the blue screen of death or the game is just a black screen.

I have checked all of my hardware and my hardware including the GPU has the right specs for the game itself.

All of the latest drivers are installed on my computer.

I think that it's safe to say that my computer isn't causing the problem, I just think that this has something to do with the software causing this issue.

Hopefully this gets resolved soon but until now I'll just look forward to playing the game.

The balance is just a shitty rock-paper-scissors. You take team comp A, if you start winning enemy team swaps to team comp B which hard counters you, and now your best option is to swap to team comp C to hard-counter them, and pretty much the whole game can go like this. It doesn't matter how good you are at your hero, overwhelming majority of heroes have a hard-counter picks, against which they become pretty much troll-picks and you are forced to switch.

They also went with the greediest f2p model imaginable, skins are ridiculously expensive, even new heroes are paywalled or locked behind massive grind.

Spiele Ow seit ca Release Teil 1

Hat Blizz bei den Skinkosten übertrieben? Ja, aber das is auch der Grund warum ich sonst keine F2P Games spiele.
Und wie sagt man so schön, man brauch sie auch nicht, vor allem in nem FPS.

Hat Blizz tolles PVE versprochen und nicht richtig geliefert? Leider ja, aber auch ohne das hätte ich OW weitergespielt, PVE wär nur DAS Sahnehäubchen gewesen.

Ich will jetzt nicht zuviel schreiben.

Grafik finde ich immer noch Gut.
Helden sind Super.
Gameplay macht Spaß.

Ich spiele es immer noch, zwar weniger, aber das liegt am 5vs5 womit ich iwie nicht richtig Warm werde.

War sozusagen mein 1stes FPS auf PC, hab noch paar ausprobiert aber wird soweit auch weiterhin erstmal mein einziger PVP Shooter bleiben.
Und solange es keinen Ersatz gibt werde ich auch bei OW bleiben.
Battleroyales sind nicht meins, TF2- Paladins oder so, haben nicht die Qualy oder andere Macken (Paladins iwas mit Kartendecks)

Außerdem ist es jetzt F2P.
Achtet nicht auf die Hater Commys sondern schaut es euch an und entweder bleibt ihr oder nicht, testen kostet nichts.

当游戏不再纯粹，当游戏公司一心只想着钱，玩家的情怀和喜爱将会化为灰烬。When the game is no longer pure, when the game company is only focused on money, the feelings and affection of players will be reduced to ashes.

不是人们抛弃了守望先锋。而是守望先锋不会是玩家的英雄了。再也不会是了。It's not that people abandoned Overwatch. It's that Overwatch won't be the player's hero anymore. Not Anymore.

专门花几分钟登游戏就为了给你这个司马贱种一个差评，我这边建议暴雪你去吃你妈的骨灰伴狗粪，考迪克你出门能不能立刻遇见擎天柱直接给你这个畜生愉悦送走啊。
